Reviews.Title: Great combo
Reviews.Author: scooter67
Reviews.Content: My daughter's Christmas gift.  She LOVES it.  Cool color and all the extras! This is a great deal and would advise anyone looking for a teenager's gift (other than whipping out the bucks for an iPhone) to get it.

Reviews.Title: Good, practical, easy to use digital camera...
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Bennett "justmesuzanne"
Reviews.Content: I don't really use the connection with social media, but this is a good, simple camera for taking shots and uploading them. Very user-friendly.

ProductInfo.Features:
12Mp Resolution
2.4" LCD Screen
35mm Lens
SD/SDHC Memory Card Slot
5x Digital Zoom
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak Easyshare C1505 12 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Zoom (Red) 16GB Package 2
